title: Fragment, 1921-22-39, mid- 18th–18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Narrow fragment (portion of belt with buttonhole at one end) of uncut "droguet" velvet. Narrow stripes of pale orchid pile in lozenge-shape alternating with minute blossoms of green, rose and browns on white silk foundation.
